attributes.action: Have ALL vehicles entering the UK purchase a temporary road use permit at the port of entry. Charges to be based on the equivalent Road Tax charges paid by UK residents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present any foreign vehicle can enter the UK and be used on ALL of our roads without contributing in any way to road maintenance. The only exceptions being the M6 Toll and certain river crossing like the Humber Bridge or Dartford Crossing. Some years ago I entered Switzerland, from France, and was oblidged to purchase a permit, from the border post, before I could use the main roads or Motorways. Such a system would, amongst other things, help our UK haulage industry compete with foreign Companies.
